data.question: What is the color of the solid compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n when it is first obtained?
At what temperature does compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n display luminescence in the solid state?
What happens to the emission band of solid complex {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n when exposed to THF vapor?
data.answer: The RT emission band shifts from 531 to 507 nm

data.question: Is the process of color change upon exposure to organic vapors reversible for compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
Does the emission spectrum of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n depend on the excitation wavelength?
Can the structure of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n accommodate molecules within its lattice?
Is compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n luminescent when dissolved in THF?
What is the effect of temperature on the luminescence of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
data.answer: The emission is shifted to 547 nm at 77 K

data.question: What causes the vapochromic behavior of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
data.answer: Exposure to a variety of organic vapors

data.question: Does the crystal structure of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n have channels that run parallel to the z axis?
What is the result of the interaction between VOCs and compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
data.answer: Shifts in the RT emission band

data.question: Is the luminescence of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n at room temperature due to fluorescence?
data.answer: No, it is suggestive of phosphorescence

data.question: What is the effect of particle size on the emission energy of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
data.answer: The emission energy shifts with particle size

data.question: Does the solid complex {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n show semiconductivity?
What is the role of Tl···Cl and Au···Cl contacts in the structure of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n?
data.answer: They contribute to the stability of the system

data.question: Are the Au−Tl distances in compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n shorter than the sum of Au(I) and Tl(I) ionic radii?
What happens to the color of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n under UV light after exposure to organic vapors?
data.answer: The color changes deeper under UV light

data.question: Is the luminescence observed in compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n originated from the Au−Tl interactions?
Does the absorption spectrum of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n in the solid state display a peak at 343 nm?
What is the significance of the new absorption band in the range 455−600 nm for the solids resulting from the exposure of compound {Tl[Au(C6Cl5)2]}n to VOCs?
data.answer: It suggests that these bands give rise to the luminescence
